meanings.definition: To allow or give permission for something to happen.
meanings.sent1: Mom will permit you to go to the park with your friends.
meanings.sent2: Please permit me to enter the building.
meanings.sent3: The cat will only permit you to pet her when she's in a good mood.
meanings.sent4: The teacher will permit extra time for the students to complete the test.
meanings.sent5: The sign will permit parking for only 30 minutes.

meanings.definition: An official document or license that allows someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to carry your permit while fishing in the lake.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker showed his permit to enter the site.
meanings.sent3: The permit to drive a car must be renewed annually.
meanings.sent4: The permit to access the restricted area was carefully checked by security.
meanings.sent5: The permit to sell food at the event was displayed prominently.
